steps.description: add-Extract and add contents of an egg to a microwave-safe bowl
steps.modified_description: Add-Extract spilling and add contents of an egg to a microwave-safe bowl with shells

errors.description: Not extracting egg correctly and adding shells to the bowl and remove them later

steps.description: Mix-Mix the contents of the bowl well
Add-Add 1/2 tbsp sweet and sour sauce to the bowl
steps.modified_description: Add-Add 1/2 tsp sweet and sour sauce to the bowl instead of 1/2 tbsp

errors.description: Add 1/2 tsp instead of 1/2 tbsp to the bowl

steps.description: Add-Add 1 tbsp salsa to the bowl
Microwave-Microwave for 3 minutes, stirring in between

errors.description: Microwave for 30 sec instead of 3 min

steps.description: Pour-Pour egg mixture on top of the tortilla
Sprinkle-Sprinkle 1 tbsp shredded cheddar cheese on top of the egg

errors.description: Using dirty spoon to scoop cheddar cheese

steps.description: Roll-Roll the tortilla from one end to another into a log shape, about 1.5 inches thick. Roll it tight enough to prevent gaps but not so tight that the filling leaks
steps.modified_description: Roll-Roll the tortilla from one end to another into a log shape improperly, about 1.5 inches thick. Roll it loosely so that the filling leaks

errors.description: Roll improperly such that filling leaks

steps.description: Place-Place 8 inch tortilla on a cutting board
